metadata.description: Storage account type to store new VM.
Unique DNS Name for the Public IP used to access the VM.  Do not include domain name suffix.  It can be the same as the internal VM name.
Size of data disk.  This is NOT the temporary D drive that is added for temporary use.
Subnet for VM. Front-end or back-end?
